Topics.Title: Viewing Transaction History
Topics.Summary: Search and review past inventory transactions.
Topics.Content:
Transaction History

Access the full transaction log to review all inventory movements.

Accessing History

  1. Navigate to Menu > View > Transactions.
  2. The Transaction History window displays all recorded inventory movements.

Search Filters

Use the search panel to filter transactions by:

  • Date Range: Specify start and end dates.
  • Part Number: Filter by specific part.
  • Location: Show transactions for a specific location.
  • User: See transactions by a specific user (Admin only).
  • Transaction Type: Filter by IN, OUT, or TRANSFER.

Pagination

Large result sets are automatically paginated. Use the pagination controls at the bottom of the grid to navigate through pages.

Topics.Title: Transaction Details
Topics.Content:
Transaction Details

Each transaction record includes comprehensive information about the inventory movement.

Transaction Fields

  • Transaction ID: Unique identifier for the transaction.
  • Timestamp: Exact date and time the transaction was recorded.
  • User: The user who performed the transaction.
  • Part Number: The part that was moved.
  • Quantity: Amount moved.
  • From Location: Source location (for OUT and TRANSFER).
  • To Location: Destination location (for IN and TRANSFER).
  • Operation: Associated manufacturing operation (if applicable).

Exporting History

Right-click on the grid and select Export to Excel to download transaction history for external analysis.
